verbose_text: The 88-bp miR-7 hairpin was amplified using primers forward (fwd) : 5 '-caagaagagaactctgaatagggaattgggGAGTGCATTCCGTATGGAAG-3 ' and reverse (rev) 5 '-aagtaaggttccttcacaaagatcctctagAAATGCACGCCGTAAGAAG-3 ' and cloned via Gibson assembly into EcoRI and XbaI cut pUAST attB.
